name: @9elt/simple-color
description: A lightweight, simple rgb color class

scripts.build:cjs: tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && d="$(cat ./dist/cjs/index.d.ts)"; echo "${d/ extends Uint16Array/}"> ./dist/cjs/index.d.ts
scripts.build:esm: tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && d="$(cat ./dist/esm/index.d.ts)"; echo "${d/ extends Uint16Array/}"> ./dist/esm/index.d.ts && echo '{"type":"module"}' >dist/esm/package.json
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.pub: npm run build && mv README README.md && npm publish; mv README.md README

author: Lorenzo Cicuttin
